channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Giveaways
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Giveaways

item.title: CVE-2023-1121|2023-04-10T13:18:04.716Z -- unknown -- simple%20giveaways
item.description: The Simple Giveaways WordPress plugin before 2.45.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2023-1120|2023-04-10T13:18:00.817Z -- unknown -- simple%20giveaways
item.description: The Simple Giveaways WordPress plugin before 2.45.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2023-1122|2023-04-10T13:17:53.053Z -- unknown -- simple%20giveaways
item.description: The Simple Giveaways WordPress plugin before 2.45.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its Giveaways options, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
